title: Post Valentine’s Day Drama
itunes:title: Post Valentine’s Day Drama
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I need help getting back on track with my girl. My girl makes a big deal about Valentine’s Day even though I spoil her all year long. I’m a true romantic and I love this woman. I also have 2 female friends that I’ve known for many years and my girl is friendly with them. This Valentine’s Day, I went all out and prepared filet mignon, lobster tails, garlic mashed potatoes and a Greek salad for my girl...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Dear Steve and Shirley, I need help getting back on track with my girl. My girl makes a big deal about Valentine’s Day even though I spoil her all year long. I’m a true romantic and I love this woman. I also have 2 female friends that I’ve known for many years and my girl is friendly with them. This Valentine’s Day, I went all out and prepared filet mignon, lobster tails, garlic mashed potatoes and a Greek salad for my girl...............
